Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.




Here are some example items:

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there

Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed

	- hp - character hit points

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.




Here are some example items:

{
	"name": "Enchanted Sword",
	"description": "A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.",
	"looks": "The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.",
	"durability": 150,
	"item_usage": "one_hand",
	"dmg": {
		"dmg_physical": 15
	},
	"stat_bonus": {
		"str": 5,
		"dex": 3
	},
	"weight": 2.5,
	"special_effects": {
		"elemental_damage": "Adds additional fire damage to attacks"
	}
}

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin

	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing

	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

0 - 3
Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

		"int": 5,

		"int": 10
	},
	"weight": 5.5,
	"special_effects": {
		"burning_touch": "Attacks have a chance to ignite the target, causing additional fire damage over time."
	}

0 - 3
Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

{
	"error": {
		"code": "rate_limit_exceeded",
		"message": "Rate limit reached for default-gpt-3.5-turbo-16k in organization org-4W08fycqDplbgpSepe2EmqI1 on tokens per min. Limit: 40000 / min. Please try again in 1ms. Visit https://platform.openai.com/account/billing to add a payment method.",
		"param": null,
		"type": "tokens"
	}

After sleep
1
0 - 3
Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed

Before sleep



After sleep
1
0 - 3
100000 - 3

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",

	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.




Here are some example items:

Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...

		@...

	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration

Before sleep



After sleep
1
0 - 3
100000 - 3

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.

Sending system message:
Use following json format:
{
	"name": "@provide item name here",
	"description": "@provide item description here",
	"looks": "@provide description of how the item looks",
	"durability": @provide item durability in numerical value,
	"item_usage": "@provide item usage from available: consumable, trinket, one_hand, two_hand, wear_hand, wear_head, wear_feet, wear_legs, wear_torso, wear_back, util, junk",
	"item_recipee": [
		"@ingredient 1",
		"@ingredient 2",
		@...
	],
	"dmg": {
		"@one of available damage types: dmg_physical, dmg_nature, dmg_ice, dmg_lightning, dmg_fire, dmg_water, dmg_mental, dmg_air, dmg_dark, dmg_light, dmg_earth, dmg_mana, dmg_stamina, or any other you deem relevant": @provide numerical value of damage: positive when damaging, negative while healing,
		@...
	},
	"dmg_over_time": {
		"@one of available damage types, same as in 'dmg'": [
			@numerical value of total damage positive takes damage and negative heals,
			@numerical value of time in secends over which above damage is dealt
		],
		@...
	}
	"stat_bonus": {
		"@bonuses for stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck, max_hp, max_mp, max_sta, def, spd, resistance_acid, resistance_poison, and any other resistance you deem relevant": @positive or negative bonuses to stats during item usage,
		@...
	},
	"usage_requirements": {
		"@one of the base stats: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha, per, luck", @minimal numerical required value of this stat,
		@...
	},
	"weight": @numerical weight value in kg,
	"special_weapon_skils": {
		"@weapon skill name": "@skill short description",
		@...
	},
	"special_effects": {
		"@special effect name": "@special effect short description",
		@...
	}
}

Fill all places with apropriate values and formats where value starts at '@'.
Some can be ommited when not applicable.

Never write that some statisitic is 0 or unknown in item json - just ommit this
entry.

If recipee is unknown then just ommit the field. If item has no special effects
then ommit this field as mell. Do the same for special weapon skills. If there
are no requirements for use then ommit that field as well. If no stat bonuses of
damage then ommit that fields as well.


Base stats used in game:
	- str - strength - infuences character HP and STA, determines physical DMG, and carrying capacity
	- dex - dexterity - influences character STA, determines item/weapon/tool handling capability, attacks accuracy, etc.
	- con - constitution - influences character STA, HP, resistance to attacks, poisons, stunt, etc.
	- int - intelligence - determines character MP, spell power, ability to gain knowledge, learn new skills and spells
	- wis - wisdom - influences knowledge character has, ability to gain insight about skills or spells
	- cha - charisma - influences ability to persuade people, barter, etc.
	- per - perception - ability to see, hear and percieve hidden things
	- luck - luck - determines how lucky character is with attacks, drops, loots, story, etc.
Derived stats used in game (these are determined from base stats and skill or item bonuses):
	- max_hp - maximum amount of hit points
	- max_mp - maximum amount of mana
	- max_sta - maximum amount of stamina
	- spd - speed, determines character movement (walking, running, swimming, etc.) speed and attack speed
	- def - defense, determines armor strength which protects against piercing and slashing damage
	- regen_hp - hit points regeneration
	- regen_mp - mana regeneration
	- regen_sta - stamina regeneration
	- cast_speed - spell cast speed
Other stats:
	- hp - character hit points
	- mp - character mana
	- sta - charachter stamin
Affinities:
	- affinity_fire
	- affinity_water
	- affinity_air
	- affinity_earth
	- affinity_light
	- affinity_dark
	- affinity_lightning
	- affinity_healing
Resistances:
	- resistance_fire
	- resistance_water
	- resistance_air
	- resistance_earth
	- resistance_light
	- resistance_dark
	- resistance_lightning
	- resistance_poison
	- resistance_mental
	- resistance_acid
	- resistance_fall
Damage types:
	- dmg_fire
	- dmg_water
	- dmg_air
	- dmg_earth
	- dmg_light
	- dmg_dark
	- dmg_lightning
	- dmg_poison
	- dmg_mental
	- dmg_acid
	- dmg_fall
	- dmg_blunt
	- dmg_piercing

Generate only one item json.




Here are some example items:

{
	"name": "Enchanted Sword",
	"description": "A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.",
	"looks": "The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.",
	"durability": 150,
	"item_usage": "one_hand",
	"dmg": {
		"dmg_physical": 15
	},
	"stat_bonus": {
		"str": 5,
		"dex": 3
	},
	"weight": 2.5,
	"special_effects": {
		"elemental_damage": "Adds additional fire damage to attacks"
	}
}


{
	"name": "Sword of Lightning",
	"description": "A powerful sword infused with lightning energy.",
	"looks": "The sword has a blade crackling with electricity and a hilt made of pure silver.",
	"durability": 200,
	"item_usage": "one_hand",
	"dmg": {
		"dmg_physical": 50,
		"dmg_lightning": 100
	},
	"stat_bonus": {
		"str": 10,
		"spd": 5
	},

		"str": 20
	},
	"weight": 3,
